Name: Race On Ice 2022 Pro
About the game: Race On Ice 2022 Pro is an ice racing game where you can drive 29 drivers of the year 2021-2022 of the category Pro and Lite . The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race. New : - New electric car for Silvin Comp√©tition's team - A grid of 5-6 to 6-7 cars - R.O.I Lite is back - Update of circuits with some new and the correct of trucks's size and pit sign Feature : 3 Modes : Time Attack , Race and Season Time Attack : Train on one of the 6 circuits for improve yourself . Race : There are 28 pilots who are divided in 6 teams. So choose a driver and try to lead him to victory. Season : - Season 2021-2022 of R.O.I Pro 15 drivers 6 teams and 6 tracks Race with 6-7 cars Season 5 races - Season 2021-2022 of R.O.I Lite 14 drivers 6 teams and 6 tracks Race with 6-7 cars Season 5 races Only keyboards and mouse This game includes : - Fake names - Fake tracks - Fake teams - Fake cars No licence
